thaman wahansege namata athishayinma sarilana paridi dharma gaweshanayehi niyuthu unwahanse ,pera apara dediga bhashanthara danumen ha mano widyawa athulu samakalina widya shasthriya danumen anuna wana seka.1981 pebarawari masa 9 wana dina pawidi diwiya wetha pa thabu unwahansege pawidi aacharyawarayanan wahanse wuye danata ingiriye madakada aaranya senasanadhipathi ampitiye mangala na himipanoya. 1982 juni masa 7 dina unwahansege upasampada prapthiya siduwuye ewakata malwathu wihara parshwaye mahanayaka dhuraya daru athipujya sirimalwaththe aanandabhidhana maha na himipanange upadhyayathwayeni.pawidi aacharyayan wahanselage maga penwima yatathe mulika dharma winaya hadala unwahanse, kolambaa, hunupitiye gangarama wiharastha piriwena ha maharagama siri wajiranyana dharmayathanaye wadidura dharma shasthriya adhyapanaya labuha.
me mathiwarana wyaparaya atharathura namal rajapaksha manthrithuma priyankara jayarathna amathiwarayata kiwwe apuru kathawak.

meya amathyanshaya parshawayen sidukala tendar kondesi amuamuwe wikruthi karamin kondesi ullanghanaya kirimak wu athara kese wuwath lansukaruwan thaman idiripath kala tab pariganakayata adalawa pahadili kirim amathyanshaya wetha yomukara atha.
ohu mese ahas maliga nagaddi, wishala galak kanda pahalata peraligena aawa.
eya sabawinma anathurak bawa thamunnahata penne nathi eka gana kanagatu wemi.
ada dawase mata hithuna lassana adara githa pelak oyala wagey lassana aya ekka beda ganna mata hithuna.
namuth apa hama jiwithaye di ma api bana bhawana karala naha.
ehi sadahanwa aththe wishesha aayudhayakin hisata ana molaye kotas eliyata ganimen mema maranaya sidukara athi bawayi.
esema, thani palati kotas aaharayata gatha haki athara, ema shakayama wenath wisha drawya lesa wisha sahitha we.
" ee monawatada dannawada...oyala gawa thiyena aachara dharma walata...ee kiyanne oyala nitharama hoda purudu athi karaganna purudu wenna oone.

(amathyanshayaka saha adhikariyaka lekam dhuraya ek pudgalayek ekama awasthawaka darima pasasiya yuthu amuthu rajya paripalana kramawedayaki.)

abhawapraptha wana wita 80 wani wiye pasuwuyeya. 1964 wasare thiragatha wu sujage rahasa chithrapatayen ohu rangana jiwithayata piwisi athara chithrapata 60 kata aාsanna sankhyawakata naluwek lesa siya dayakathwaya laba di atha. 1977 di tom pachaya chithrapata adhyakshayen adhyakshaka kshethrayata piwisi ee mahatha gedara budun amma, cheriyo doktar, okkoma kanapita, cheriyo kaptan, ra daniyel dawal migel aadi chithrapata 30kata adhika sankhyawak adhyakshanaya kaleya.
